title: Predicting League of Legends Match Outcomes
description: Logistic regression and gradient boosting on pro match data; early-game features; fairness audit; >95% accuracy; slight blue-side bias.

title: Sports Betting Behavior Analysis
description: Explored odds fluctuations vs. betting patterns (EPL, NFL) with regression, A/B tests, hypothesis testing.

title: Medical Bill Decoder App
description: Swift + NLP app translating medical bills and estimating costs with breakdown visualizations.
